short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the Canvas Grades page more functional and visually appealing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that calculates and displays the mean and median grades for a given class, useful for determining your relative position in classes that are curved. Added several other text and visual changes to make the page a bit better (most changes are minor but helpful in my opinion), such as hiding ungraded assignments and categories.
